moreBlocks.articles:
• Practice Areas
    From its inception 1987, the attorneys at Franklin D. Azar & Associates, P.C. have provided aggressive and effective legal representation for Colorado area residents in cases involving personal injuries.areas
  • Denver Auto Accident Lawyer
    Unfortunately, driving or riding in a car can have dangerous results.
  • Denver Motorcycle Accident Attorney
    As with any type of vehicle accident, motorcycle accidents can cause serious injuries in an instant.
  • Denver Bad Faith Insurance Attorney
    It is required by law that your insurance company conducts business with you in good faith whenever a claim is submitted for you or against you.
  • Denver Bus Accident Attorney
    Our Denver Auto Accident Attorneys are acutely aware that bus accidents are a particular concern for the thousands of students that travel to school each day by school bus.

description:
At Franklin D. Azar & Associates, P.C., in Colorado Springs, Colorado, we are a serious personal injury law firm that is serious about obtaining full compensation and benefits for its injured clients.

We can get you the medical care and money you need in the following situations:

  • Serious personal injury accidents such as car, truck or motorcycle wrecks caused by negligence or carelessness. We also represent clients who have fallen from unsafe stairways or on slick floors, been attacked by unsupervised animals or have been injured due to medical negligence, defective products or dangerous drugs.
  • Class-action lawsuits in which many people who have been injured by a single cause seek compensation and other remedies from liable businesses, individuals or organizations
  • Workers' compensation benefits to ensure employees injured while on the job receive appropriate medical treatments, are paid back wages and receive additional benefits
  • Federal Social Security Disability (SSD) payments to offset the costs of a long-term injury or disability
  • Wrongful death lawsuits on behalf of the spouses and children of people who died from their injuries

When It's Serious, Call In The Strong Arm

Our founding attorney, Frank Azar, is known as "The Strong Arm" of Colorado personal injury law. He and our tenacious legal team will push through any obstacle to get you the compensation and government benefits you need after a serious personal injury. Contact us today, and one of our lawyers will meet with you to discuss your options at no cost.

Also, we never charge attorney fees unless we recover compensation for our clients. If Spanish is your first language, we welcome your business: Se habla español.

If you are seriously injured, you need a serious attorney. To discuss your injuries and options in a free consultation with an attorney, call Franklin D. Azar & Associates, P.C., in Colorado Springs today. We also maintain offices in Aurora, Pueblo and Trinidad, Colorado. Our phone lines are open all day, every day.
